channel.title: Nanoscale on DistributedFog

item.title: P1906.1
item.description: The IEEE P1906.1 - Recommended Practice for Nanoscale and Molecular Communication Framework - is a standards working group sponsored by the IEEE Communications Society Standards Development Board whose goal is to develop a common framework for nanoscale and molecular communication. Wikipedia A nanoscale communication network is a human-designed system for communicating at or with the nanoscale, using physical principles that are suited to nanoscale systems.
